definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: meaning dub., usu. coarse meal; LXX AV RV dough, so Toy (with ?) (NH [[עַרְסָן]] barley-meal; Syr. 0arsono0 (in Lexx) hulled barley, or (cf. Lag:GGN 1889, 301 f.) wheat); > Sm:Ez Co:Ez kneading-trough (so NH [[עֲרִיסָה]] Jastr; appar. secondary, [[עֲרִיסָה]] also [bed], cradle, v. [[ערשׂ]]);—only [[רֵאשִׁית עֲרִיסׂתֵיכֶם]] Ez Eze 44:30, [[עֲרִיסׂתֵינוּ]] ´[[ר]] Ne 10:38; [[עֲרִסׂתֵיכֶם]] ´[[ר]] Nu 15:20, Nu 15:21 (P).
